properties.value: Mithril brutal arrows are used to kill zogres south of the Castle Wars arena. They are made with flighted ogre arrows and mithril nails. Level 49 Fletching is required to make these and they will yield 7.5 experience per arrow.

Mithril brutal arrows are used to kill zogres south of the Castle Wars arena. They are made with flighted ogre arrows and mithril nails. Level 49 Fletching is required to make these and they will yield 7.5 experience per arrow.

[[File:Mithril brutal detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Mithril brutal arrows''' are used to kill [[zogre]]s south of the [[Castle Wars]] arena. They are made with [[flighted ogre arrow]]s and [[mithril nails]]. Level 49 [[Fletching]] is required to make these and they will yield 7.5 [[experience]] per arrow.
